attributes.action: Reduce the amount of Co2 pumped into the atmosphere.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Are you fed up of the amount of Co2 pumped into the atmosphere Unnecessarily, help reduce this.

rejection.details: Could you please specify your request. Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
